entry.def: A miller is a person who owns or operates a mill in which grain is crushed to make flour.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who works in a mill (especially a grain mill)
2. machine tool in which metal that is secured to a carriage is fed against rotating cutters that shape it
3. any of various moths that have powdery wings
